title: Ignorance is Bliss
description: This is an alternate cover edition for B00C1IUXQA Life is complicated when you’re not the right gender, but what if your parent is not exactly in her right mind? Andy McDonald is transgendered, but Andy’s mother has a condition that prevents her from dealing with reality—including the reality that her son is her daughter. Fortunately, Andy has met a girl transitioning to life as a male, and the two help each other deal with the difficulties of life as transgendered teenagers. But Andy must also deal with the difficulties of his mother precarious mental state.
author: Karin Bishop
